EmailTemplate.description: Email to notify the field that an extension is needed for a RFP
EmailTemplate.name: WRF Extension Needed
EmailTemplate.subject: WRF Extension Needed: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.WRF_Requestor_Name__c},
Thank you for your Work Request submission for {!Case.Account}. We appreciate the opportunity to work with you.
This bid is due {!Case.WRF_Prpsl_Deadln__c}. Our standard turn around time to complete a bid request is 7 to 10 business days. This opportunity needs an extension to be completed.
Please let us know if you can obtain an extension of the due date.
We may not be able to bid this without an extension.
Thank you
BSD BIDS
